languages.text: Кардинал сошел с ума. Стоило его убить

traits.locale_text: Кардинал сошел с ума. Стоило его убить

languages.text: "Помазанни{mf|к|ца}, ты пал{mf||а} во тьму греха, но мы даруем тебе искупление. Не сопротивляйся, прими этот дар — через боль ты найдешь путь к Нему".

traits.locale_text: "Помазанни{rt_mf|к|ца}, ты пал{rt_mf||а} во тьму греха, но мы даруем тебе искупление. Не сопротивляйся, прими этот дар — через боль ты найдешь путь к Нему".

languages.text: "Anointed One! You have sunk into depravity, but we offer redemption. Do not resist. Accept this gift, and let the pain guide you to Him."
languages.original_text: "Помазанни{mf|к|ца}, ты пал{mf||а} во тьму греха, но мы даруем тебе искупление. Не сопротивляйся, прими этот дар — через боль ты найдешь путь к Нему".

traits.locale_text: "Anointed One! You have fallen into the depths of sin, but we offer redemption. Do not resist, accept this gift, and let the pain guide you to Him."
"Anointed One! You have fallen into the depths of sin, but we offer redemption. Do not resist. Accept this gift, and let the pain guide you to Him."
"Anointed One! You have fallen into the depths of sin, but we offer redemption. Do not resist. Accept this gift, and let the pain guide you to Him."
"Anointed One! You have sunk into depravity, but we offer redemption. Do not resist. Accept this gift, and let the pain guide you to Him."
"Anointed One! You have sunk into depravity, but we offer redemption. Do not resist. Accept this gift, and let the pain guide you to Him."

languages.text: "{mf|Gesalbter|Gesalbte}! Ihr seid der Verderbtheit verfallen, aber wir bieten Euch Erlösung. Wehrt Euch nicht dagegen. Nehmt diese Gabe an, auf dass Euch der Schmerz zu Ihm führe."
languages.original_text: "Anointed One! You have sunk into depravity, but we offer redemption. Do not resist. Accept this gift, and let the pain guide you to Him."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Gesalbter|Gesalbte}! Ihr seid der Verderbtheit verfallen, aber wir bieten Euch Erlösung. Wehrt Euch nicht dagegen. Nehmt diese Gabe an, auf dass Euch der Schmerz zu Ihm führe."

languages.text: « {mf|Élu|Élue} ! Vous avez sombré dans la dépravation, mais nous vous offrons le salut. Ne résistez pas. Acceptez ce présent et laissez la douleur vous guider jusqu'à Lui. »
languages.original_text: "Anointed One! You have sunk into depravity, but we offer redemption. Do not resist. Accept this gift, and let the pain guide you to Him."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Élu|Élue} ! Vous avez sombré dans la dépravation, mais nous vous offrons le salut. Ne résistez pas. Acceptez ce présent et laissez la douleur vous guider jusqu'à Lui. »

languages.text: “神选者！你已经堕入了异端，但我们会带来救赎。不要反抗，接受这份礼物，让痛苦指引你来到神皇面前吧。”
languages.original_text: "Anointed One! You have sunk into depravity, but we offer redemption. Do not resist. Accept this gift, and let the pain guide you to Him."

traits.locale_text: “神选者！你已经堕入了异端，但我们会带来救赎。不要反抗，接受这份礼物，让痛苦指引你来到神皇面前吧。”

languages.text: «¡Ungid{mf|o|a}! Se ha sumido en la depravación, pero le ofrecemos la redención. No se resista. Acepte este don y deje que el dolor l{mf|o|a} guíe hasta el Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Anointed One! You have sunk into depravity, but we offer redemption. Do not resist. Accept this gift, and let the pain guide you to Him."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ungid{mf|o|a}! Se ha sumido en la depravación, pero le ofrecemos la redención. No se resista. Acepte este don y deje que el dolor l{mf|o|a} guíe hasta el Emperador».

languages.text: 「聖別されし者よ！汝はすでに堕落の淵へと沈んだ―されど我らは救済を授けよう。抗うことなかれ。この贈り物を受け入れよ。その苦痛が、汝をかの御方のもとへと導かん」
languages.original_text: "Anointed One! You have sunk into depravity, but we offer redemption. Do not resist. Accept this gift, and let the pain guide you to Him."

traits.locale_text: 「聖別されし者よ！汝はすでに堕落の淵へと沈んだ―されど我らは救済を授けよう。抗うことなかれ。この贈り物を受け入れよ。その苦痛が、汝をかの御方のもとへと導かん」

languages.text: "Kutsanmış! Sefalete saplandın, kurtuluş sunuyoruz. Direnme. Bu armağanı kabul et. Acı seni O'na götürecek."
languages.original_text: "Anointed One! You have sunk into depravity, but we offer redemption. Do not resist. Accept this gift, and let the pain guide you to Him."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsanmış! Sefalete saplandın ama kurtuluş sunuyoruz. Direnme. Bu armağanı kabul et ve acı seni O'na götürsün."
